price: 38. Kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyow! Maxaa idiinku wacan, in marka la idinku yidhaahdo: U soo baxa jihaadka Arrinka Alle aad isagu dhajisaan dhulka si culus? Ma waxaad ku raalli noqoteen nolosha adduunkan oo aad ka door biddeen Aakhirada? Ma aha raaxada noloshan adduunku marka la barbar dhigo Aakhirada waxaan ahayn wax yar.11
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَا لَكُمۡ إِذَا قِيلَ لَكُمُ ٱنفِرُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ٱثَّاقَلۡتُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ أَرَضِيتُم بِٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا مِنَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ فَمَا مَتَٰعُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِلَّا قَلِيلٌ
footnotes: 11. Anas bin Maalik a.k..r waxaa laga soo weriyey in Nabigu s.c.w. yidhi: “Ma jiro addoon dhinta ayna u taallo Alle agti kheyr oo jecel inuu u soo laabto adduunka iyadoo lagu siinayo adduunka iyo waxa yaal oo dhan marka laga reebo shahiidka, waxa uu arkayo darteed oo fadliga shahaadada ah, wuxuu jecleystaa inuu u soo laabto adduunka si loogu dilo mar kale Dar Alle.  W.w Al-Bukhaari.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū mā lakum idhā qīla lakumu infirū fī sabīli al-lahi ithāqaltum ilā al-arḍi araḍītum bil-ḥayati al-dun'yā mina al-ākhirati famā matāʿu al-ḥayati al-dun'yā fī al-ākhirati illā qalīlun
